trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_SEQ_00<tab>Rral Soj has a new order of business to discuss.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_SEQ_01<tab>Rral Soj has tasked you with crafting tortilla presses for Aunt Tii's Tacos.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 210. Delivering items with a rating of 430 or more will earn greater rewards.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the tortilla presses to Rral Soj. Aunt Tii soon arrives to pick them up, and is pleased to see her bulk order was finished in time─no thanks to Papawni, unfortunately, who was so fixated on crafting a flawless press, that she only managed to make a single one. It seems Rral Soj will still need your help for now.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the tortilla presses to Rral Soj.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_000<tab>I never realized it would warm my heart so, to be thanked directly by a patron... It's a wonderful feeling!
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_010<tab>Glad you're here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_011<tab>Thanks to our last client, word of our efficiency seems to have spread, and a new bulk order has come in. I trust I can still count on your help?
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_013<tab>So, what's the request this time?
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_014<tab>...A large order o' tortilla presses for Aunt Tii's.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_015<tab>Er...who's that?
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_016<tab>What? You've never heard o' Aunt Tii's Tacos? It's one o' the most popular taco places in the city.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_017<tab>I see... But are tortilla presses normally ordered in bulk? Surely her stock didn't break all at once...?

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_018<tab>This is somethin' of a special case. Seems the manufactory in charge o' Tii's tortilla production's havin' a complete overhaul, and everythin' needs replaced─spares included. She wants us to prepare as many presses as possible.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_100_018<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'd like you to make six o' 'em. Papawni and I'll handle the remainder.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_019<tab>Tii entrusted this order to my shop 'cause she has faith we'll get the job done in a timely fashion. Let's show her what we're made of.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_020<tab>You've got it! I'll do my best to make sure she leaves just as satisfied as our last customer!
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_030<tab>As I understand, the most crucial factor is to ensure each tortilla is pressed to a uniform size... This may require some metalworking wizardry!
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_040<tab>I'll be hard at work craftin' my share o' presses when I get a spare moment from tendin' the shop. Soon as you have your share ready, just say the word.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_050<tab>Ah, finished already, have you? Aunt Tii is sure to be satisfied with this handiwork.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_051<tab>Ah, finished already, have you? This has jus' the right amount o' weightiness to it, an' the surfaces look perfectly flat. I daresay Tii will steal whatever competition is left with the tortillas she makes from these.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_060<tab>Everyone, meet Tii. Tii, meet the team.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_TIISOLJA_000_061<tab>Hello, hello! I'm Tiisol, the proud owner of Aunt Tii's Tacos! It's lovely to meet you all. Your lightning-fast work with the presses is an absolute <var 1A 02 /var>godssend<var 1A 01 /var>─I can't thank you enough!

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_TIISOLJA_000_062<tab>We'd been using only hardwood presses at the manufactory till now, but I can't tell you how many times I've had to order replacements. The things seem to break at the slightest bit of force! Having metal presses will be a huge relief.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_100_062<tab>I promise you these can take a beatin', and then some.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_TIISOLJA_000_063<tab>Oh, I don't doubt it! And, seeing as you've proven yourself a woman of your word, you'll be the first person I come to for my cooking supplies from now on!

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_TIISOLJA_000_064<tab>Now then, I must be getting these presses to the manufactory, so I'll excuse myself here. Do be sure to visit my store next chance you get─would be a shame if you didn't get a taste of the tortillas you had a hand in making!
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_065<tab>We'd never have been able to fulfill the order in time if not for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. My thanks.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_066<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Mistress Rral Soj... I am so, so sorry. Once again, I was too slow. I only managed to prepare a single press...
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_067<tab>Papawni. You put your heart into your work. I can see that.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_068<tab>But if you're gonna continue to work here, you need to come to grips with the stipulations o' the job. Truth be told, I need you outputtin' the same amount as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_069<tab>I've been watchin' you work. You spend far too much time devotin' your attention to a single item.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_070<tab>I-I'm sorry! I was so thrilled to see my efforts appreciated before, I thought that if I put my all into these presses as well, Mistress Tiisol would be overjoyed...
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_PAPAWNI_000_071<tab>I wanted to make them flawless and easy to maintain, and in the process...I completely lost track of the time.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_072<tab>I admire that you're trying to make the best product possible, but sometimes a customer only wants a tool that works─and they want it quick. Try to keep that in mind next time.

TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_RRALSOJ_000_073<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, looks like you're not rid of me yet. I can't rely on your help forever, but for now, please continue to lend us your expertise.
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Rral Soj is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Marvelous Metalworker<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA103_04970_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>The next request will be available from Rral Soj upon reaching level 95 as a blacksmith, armorer, or goldsmith.
